entry.title: HEXO-next 文章阅读次数、gulp压缩、调试命令优化
entry.content: 配置显示阅读次数、压缩js和css文件、几个偷懒小技巧 插件gitlab 地址https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-leancloud-counter-security 大致步骤参考如下博主文章：https://leaferx.online/2018/02/11/lc-security/ 其中在修正deploy的时候注意tab的控制，不然编译会报错： 12345678910deploy: #type: git #repository: git@github.com:x695/thinkee.github.io.git #repository: https://github.com/x695/thinkee.github.io.git #branch: master - type: git #repository: git@e.coding.net:yangshixian/blog.git repository: git@git.coding.net:thinkee/blog.coding.me.git branch: master - type: leancloud_counter_security_sync gulp进行压缩https://blog.csdn.net/ganzhilin520/article/details/79052512 nmp 脚本运行 简化调试动作在博客根目录下的package.json 中最后加入1234, "scripts": { "d": "hexo cl && hexo g && gulp && hexo d && hexo s" } 这样因为跑清理、部署、调试的时候,执行下1nmp run d 就可以了。 新建文章后自动打开vs code在博客跟目录下 建立 scripts 文件夹 写入下面的js文件，文件名随意命名 12345let spawn = require('hexo-util/lib/spawn');hexo.on('new', (data) => { spawn('code', [hexo.base_dir, data.path]);}); 这样就自动打开了 12 $ hexo new "HEXO-next 文章阅读次数、gulp压缩、调试命令优化"INFO Created: ~\hexo\blog\source\_posts\HEXO-next-文章阅读次数、gulp压缩、调试命令优化.md

entry.title: hexo-theme-next主题升级的时候配置文件冲突解决方法
entry.content: hexo-theme-next主题是hexo一个广为使用的主题。当采用git pull 升级的时候，会将master分支拉到本地中，然而 主题配置文件会和我们已经自定义过的配置冲突。官方提供了两个方法 next主题github地址https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next 当采用git pull 升级的时候，会将master分支拉到本地中，然而 主题配置文件会和我们已经自定义过的配置冲突。官方提供了两个方法： 1. git 操作命令来解决https://stackoverflow.com/questions/15745045/how-do-i-resolve-git-saying-commit-your-changes-or-stash-them-before-you-can-me/15745424#15745424 核心命令： 1234567891011121314151617Commit the change usinggit commit -m "My message"Stash it.Stashing acts as a stack, where you can push changes, and you pop them in reverse order.To stash, typegit stashDo the merge, and then pull the stash:git stash popDiscard the local changesusing git reset --hardor git checkout -t -f remote/branchOr: Discard local changes for a specific fileusing git checkout filename 2 用HEXO的DATA-FILES 来解决参见 https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next/blob/master/docs/DATA-FILES.md 推荐方法： 12345678910Please ensure you are using Hexo 3 (or above).Create an file named next.yml in site's hexo/source/_data directory (create _data directory if it did not exists).And after that steps there are 2 variants, need to choose only one of them and resume next steps.Variant 2: override: true:In next.yml set override option on true.Copy all NexT theme options from theme's next/_config.yml into hexo/source/_data/next.yml.Then, in main site's hexo/_config.yml need to define theme: next option (and if needed, source_dir: source).Use standart parameters to start server, generate or deploy (hexo clean && hexo g -d && hexo s).

entry.title: HEXO_next主题 自带样式设置
entry.content: 参考文档: http://theme-next.iissnan.com/tag-plugins.html 居中居中标签设置 1{% cq %} 居中标签设置 {% endcq %} note样式Content (md partial supported) 1{% note default %} Content (md partial supported) {% endnote %} default 1<div class="note default"><p>default</p></div> primary 1<div class="note primary"><p>primary</p></div> success 1<div class="note success"><p>success</p></div> info 1<div class="note info"><p>info</p></div> warning 1<div class="note warning"><p>warning</p></div> danger 1<div class="note danger"><p>danger</p></div> danger no-icon 1<div class="note danger no-icon"><p>danger no-icon</p></div> 主题配置文件1234567891011121314# Note tag (bs-callout).note: # Note tag style values: # - simple bs-callout old alert style. Default. # - modern bs-callout new (v2-v3) alert style. # - flat flat callout style with background, like on Mozilla or StackOverflow. # - disabled disable all CSS styles import of note tag. style: simple icons: true #改成true 就可以显示图标 border_radius: 3 # Offset lighter of background in % for modern and flat styles (modern: -12 | 12; flat: -18 | 6). # Offset also applied to label tag variables. This option can work with disabled note tag. light_bg_offset: 0 label 样式default {% label default@default %} primary {% label primary@primary %} success {% label success@success %} info {% label info@info %} warning {% label warning@warning %} danger {% label danger@danger %} tab选项卡 1选项卡 2选项卡 3这是选项卡 1 列表 列表 这是选项卡 2 内容balabala2这是选项卡 3 哇，你找到我了！φ(≧ω≦*)♪～ 1234567891011121314百分号前面的数字就是定位在第几个tab上{% tabs 选项卡, 1 %} <!-- tab -->**这是选项卡 1** * 列表* 列表<!-- endtab --><!-- tab -->**这是选项卡 2** 内容balabala2<!-- endtab --><!-- tab -->**这是选项卡 3** 哇，你找到我了！φ(≧ω≦*)♪～<!-- endtab -->{% endtabs %}

entry.title: NPM包管理命令
entry.content: 123456789101112npm安装模块【npm install xxx】利用 npm 安装xxx模块到当前命令行所在目录；【npm install -g xxx】利用npm安装全局模块xxx；本地安装时将模块写入package.json中：【npm install xxx】安装但不写入package.json；【npm install xxx –save】 安装并写入package.json的”dependencies”中；【npm install xxx –save-dev】安装并写入package.json的”devDependencies”中。npm 删除模块【npm uninstall xxx】删除xxx模块； 【npm uninstall -g xxx】删除全局模块xxx；
